name: Blind wizard fight
description:
Requirements: Azerty keyboard, stereo headphone, Windows Vista or higher.

It feels like the projectiles go thorough your head! The attack comes from the right. When the sound of the projectile is at your left louder than at your right, you are then hit and you need to activate a correct counter spell as fast as possible!

The analysis of this game is much bigger: 4 different defends, 4 different attacks, levels, fast playing, like no speach, 2 players offline,...

If you want the source code, it would be nice so you cold take over my project. I can work on the design documentation.

It's written in GameMaker Studio 2 licensed. 

If you hear"Well done", you finished the demo.
